Toxic Saliva.name: Toxic Saliva
Toxic Saliva.flavor: You lick your weapon, coating it in venom.
Toxic Saliva.target: An axe, heavy blade, light blade, pick, or spear, or an arrow or crossbow bolt.
Toxic Saliva.effect:
Your next successful weapon attack with the target also deals 1d6 poison damage and the target is slowed (save ends).
Level 11: 2d6 poison damage.
Level 21: 3d6 poison damage.
Toxic Saliva.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is instead immobilized (save ends).

Acidic Revenge.name: Acidic Revenge
Acidic Revenge.flavor: When you die, acid explodes from your corpse.
Acidic Revenge.attack:
Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity vs. Reflex. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
Level 11: The bonus increases to +4.
Level 21: The bonus increases to +6.
Acidic Revenge.onHit:
1d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 11: 2d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Level 21: 3d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).
